Play.Header: PHI wins toss, elects to Receive, and NO elects to defend the North goal.
17-M.Berger kicks 64 yards from NO 30 to PHI 6. 80-J.Thrash to PHI 25 for 19 yards (29-K.Craver).
PENALTY on PHI-24-S.Brown, Offensive Holding, 10 yards, enforced at PHI 25.
Philadelphia Eagles at 15:00, (1st play from scrimmage 14:55)

Play.PlayDescription: (14:55) 5-D.McNabb pass to 87-T.Pinkston to NO 37 for 48 yards (33-A.Ambrose). With this completion, McNabb tied a team record with 13 straight completions. Last week he had completed his final 12 passes against the Giants. He tied Bobby Hoying's team record previously set in 1997 at Baltimore.

Play.PlayDescription: (13:09) 26-D.McAllister right guard for 76 yards, TOUCHDOWN. Saints' McAllister hit a hole on the right side opened up by Holland and Riley and burst into the secondary. Eagles' Lewis dived for a tackle in pursuit. 76 yard career long run for Saints' McAllister. Injury update: Saints' #84 Michael Lewis, sprained right ankle, will not return.
